title: The Forever Home: How To Work With An Architect To Design
description:
The Forever Home: How To Work With An Architect To Design The Home Of Your Dreams by Kevin Harris

Overview: The Forever Home provides the foundation to confidently explore what you want, plan your dream home, and find the right professionals to make it a reality. Renowned architect Kevin Harris will guide you through his proven, step-by-step process to design and build a house that fits you so well it becomes your forever home. No matter where you travel, your forever home is the place you feel complete.
